title: The Hon. East India Company’s Fleet of Transport and War Steamers in Bombay Harbour
content:
accession_no_csv: 2016-00301

  Image: 

  object_work_type: prints (visual works) wood engravings (prints)

  title_text: The Hon. East India Company’s Fleet of Transport and War Steamers in Bombay Harbour

  preference: main

  title_language: 

  creator_2: Illustrated London News

  creator_1: Illustrated London news

  creator_role: publishers

  creation_date: 1857-01-03

  creation_place_original_location: London (England)

  inscriptions: 

  inscription_language: 

  shape: rectangular

  materials_name: paper (fiber product) printing paper

  techniques_name: printing (process) hand colouring

  object_colour: grey (colour)

  physical_appearance: The artwork depicts a fleet of steamers. The print is grey in colour. A black frame serves as its perimeter. The image and texture of water are emphasized with the use of wavering black lines. At the bottom centre of the print
 the title of the artwork is stated in capital letters. The colours on the print do not look smudged. There are no visible tears or cracks on the artwork.

  subject_terms_1: steamships transports (naval vessels) fleets harbours warships

  subject_terms_2: East India Company Prints Engraving Steamboats War Harbours

  subject_terms_3: East India Company Visual arts

  sgcool_label_text: This print depicts the East India Company’s fleet of transport and warships at Bombay Harbour
 before their sending off for the Persian Gulf in the Anglo-Persian War. This print was published in the 3 January 1857 issue of the Illustrated London News to complement an article titled “The Persian Expedition in the Gulf of Bombay”.

The colours on the print do not look smudged. There are no visible tears or cracks on the artwork.

metadata.sgcool_label_text: This print depicts the East India Company’s fleet of transport and warships at Bombay Harbour, before their sending off for the Persian Gulf in the Anglo-Persian War. This print was published in the 3 January 1857 issue of the Illustrated London News to complement an article titled “The Persian Expedition in the Gulf of Bombay”.
